docs.snippet: The European Union and the United States have agreed to recognize each other's inspections of facilities where medicines are made....

docs.snippet: A close ally of Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has acquired an ownership stake in a major print and online media company, adding weight to suspicions that the company's closure of the largest opposition newspaper last year was politically m...
docs.lead_paragraph: A close ally of Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has acquired an ownership stake in a major print and online media company, adding weight to suspicions that the company's closure of the largest opposition newspaper last year was politically motivated.

headline.main: Hungarian Leader's Ally Acquires Stake in Major Media Firm
headline.print_headline: Hungarian Leader's Ally Acquires Stake in Major Media Firm

docs.snippet: A former transportation official and mentor to New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie "should not get a get-out-of-jail card" for using his position to shake down United Airlines to relaunch a flight to his weekend home, federal prosecutors argue in a cou...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former transportation official and mentor to New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie "should not get a get-out-of-jail card" for using his position to shake down United Airlines to relaunch a flight to his weekend home, federal prosecutors argue in a court filing.

headline.main: Feds: Ex-Transportation Official Should Not Be Spared Prison
headline.print_headline: Feds: Ex-Transportation Official Should Not Be Spared Prison

docs.snippet: A mass grave containing the remains of babies and young children has been discovered at a former Catholic orphanage in Ireland, government-appointed investigators announced Friday in a finding that offered the first conclusive proof following a hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: A mass grave containing the remains of babies and young children has been discovered at a former Catholic orphanage in Ireland, government-appointed investigators announced Friday in a finding that offered the first conclusive proof following a historian's efforts to trace the fates of nearly 800 children who perished there.

headline.main: Experts Find Mass Grave at Ex-Catholic Orphanage in Ireland
headline.print_headline: Experts Find Mass Grave at Ex-Catholic Orphanage in Ireland

headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

docs.snippet: As shares of California-based Snap Inc began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, two dozen residents of the company's adopted home of Venice Beach protested outside its offices, accusing the growing tech company of spoiling their s...
docs.lead_paragraph: As shares of California-based Snap Inc began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, two dozen residents of the company's adopted home of Venice Beach protested outside its offices, accusing the growing tech company of spoiling their seaside community.

headline.main: Snap HQ Spoils Community, Venice Beach Protesters Say
headline.print_headline: Snap HQ Spoils Community, Venice Beach Protesters Say

docs.snippet: Spotify has reported via Twitter that it now has 50 million paid subscribers, a rise of 25 percent in less than six months, and extending the music streaming service's lead over its closest rival, Apple Music....

docs.snippet: Venezuelan plumber Marcos Heredia scoured 20 pharmacies in one day but could not find crucial medicines to stop his epileptic 8-year-old from convulsions that caused irreparable brain damage late last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuelan plumber Marcos Heredia scoured 20 pharmacies in one day but could not find crucial medicines to stop his epileptic 8-year-old from convulsions that caused irreparable brain damage late last year.

headline.main: Venezuela's Epileptic Patients Struggle With Seizures Amid Drug Shortage
headline.print_headline: Venezuela's Epileptic Patients Struggle With Seizures Amid Drug Shortage
